Package ca.uqac.lif.cep

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Combinable  
    Computable  
    Pullable
    Queries events on one of a processor's outputs.
    Pushable
    Gives events to some of a processor's input.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Accumulator  
    Combiner  
    Connector
    Provides a number of convenient methods for connecting the outputs of processors to the inputs of other processors.
    Constant  
    CountDecimate
    Returns one input event and discards the next n-1.
    Delay  
    Demultiplexer
    Converts a sequence of n consecutive events into n events sent simultaneously to a processor as its inputs.
    Filter
    Discards events from an input trace based on a selection criterion.
    Fork
    Duplicates an input trace into two or more output traces.
    Freeze
    Repeatedly outputs the first event it has received.
    Function  
    GroupProcessor
    Encapsulates a chain of processors as if it were a single one.
    GroupProcessor.ProcessorAssociation
    Tuple made of a number and a processor.
    Passthrough
    Returns its input as its output.
    Placeholder  
    Prefix  
    Print  
    Processor
    Receives zero or more input events, and produces zero or more output events.
    QueueSource
    Source whose input is a queue of objects.
    SingleProcessor
    Performs a computation on input events to produce output events.
    Sink
    Receives input events and stores them.
    SmartFork
    Duplicates an input event into two or more output events
    Source
    Produces output events from no input.
    TimeDecimate
    After returning an input event, discards all others for the next n seconds.
    Window
    Simulates the application of a "sliding window" to a trace.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Pullable.NextStatus
    The "next" status of the pullable.
